text: The mixed doubles tennis event of the 2019 Pan American Games was held from July 30 – August 3 at the Club Lawn Tennis de la Exposición in Lima, Peru. Alexa Guarachi and Nicolás Jarry of Chile won the Gold medal, defeating Noelia Zeballos and Federico Zeballos of Bolivia in the final, 6–1, 6–3. Anastasia Iamachkine and Sergio Galdós of Peru won the Bronze medal, defeating Andrea Weedon and Wilfredo González of Guatemala in the Bronze Medal match, 7–5, 6–1. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== ==External links== *Draw Mixed Doubles
title: Tennis at the 2019 Pan American Games – Mixed doubles
